name: EasyColorBlindTool Demo
description:
A demo showing the implementations of Easy Color Blind Tool for Unity in an actual project.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Click - Interact

Features:

  • Colorblind simulation filters: meant to be used creating the game, not as a solution
  • High Contrast mode: final game implementation
  • Visual Color code: final game implementation
Please answer the following form so I can get feedback : ) https://forms.gle/VxhUXtWXdfcGLupz6
